title: Views
description: Number of views on the NIAID Data Ecosystem.

title: License
description: License associated with data re-use.

title: DOI
description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) associated with the record.

title: Health Condition
description: The infectious disease(s) / health condition(s) which are the focus of the dataset or computational tool (e.g. COVID-19, coronavirus)

title: Pathogen
description: Infectious agent(s) / pathogen(s) which are the focus of the dataset or tool (e.g. SARS-CoV-2)

title: Species
description: Species(es) from which dataset has been collected or for which the tool was designed or applied.

title: Variable Measured
description: The variableMeasured property can indicate (repeated as necessary) the  variables that are measured in some dataset, either described as text or as pairs of identifier and description using PropertyValue.

title: Measurement Technique
description:
A technique or technology used in a dataset,
corresponding to the method used for measuring the corresponding variable(s) (described using variableMeasured). For example, if variableMeasured is: molecule concentration, measurementTechnique could be: "mass spectrometry" or "nmr spectroscopy" or "colorimetry" or "immunofluorescence".

title: Citation
description: Publication associated with the record.

title: Language
description: Language used in dataset.

title: Geographical Information
description: Geographic location covered by dataset.

title: Period
description: Period covered by dataset.

title: Source
description: A data catalog which contains this dataset (this property was previously 'catalog', preferred name is now 'includedInDataCatalog').

Originally named [[variablesMeasured]], The [[variableMeasured]] property can indicate (repeated as necessary) the  variables that are measured in some dataset, either described as text or as pairs of identifier and description using PropertyValue.

title: Date
description: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset, e.g. for a 2011 census dataset, the year 2011 (in ISO 8601 time interval format).
A data catalog which contains this dataset.
A downloadable form of this dataset, at a specific location, in a specific format.

title: Source
description: A data catalog which contains this dataset.

The International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) that identifies this serial publication. You can repeat this property to identify different formats of, or the linking ISSN (ISSN-L) for, this serial publication.

title: Computational Tool
description: A schema describing a minimal ComputationalTool for the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease (NIAID). A ComputationalTool is a software used for the collection, processing, distribution, analysis, visualization, interpretation, etc. of data. Additional schema.org and/or custom properties could be added.

title: Funding
description: Funding that supports (sponsors) the collection of this dataset or computational tool through some kind of financial contribution

title: Code Repository
description: Link to the source code repository of the tool.

title: Dataset
description: A schema describing a minimal Dataset for the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease (NIAID). A dataset is a collection of data of a particular experimental type. Additional schema.org and/or custom properties could be added.
The main programming language(s) used to build or execute the tool. Please use terms from the ‘Programming language’ table in the Bio.Tools documentation
